MarkdownCodeBlock.code_block: put 'Contacts', '1000', 'Personal:Name', 'John Dole' put 'Contacts', '1000', 'Personal:Phone', '1-425-000-0001' put 'Contacts', '1000', 'Office:Phone', '1-425-000-0002' put 'Contacts', '1000', 'Office:Address', '1111 San Gabriel Dr.' scan 'Contacts'

MarkdownCodeBlock.code_block: CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE hbasecontacts(rowkey STRING, name STRING, homephone STRING, officephone STRING, officeaddress STRING) STORED BY 'org.apache.hadoop.hive.hbase.HBaseStorageHandler' WITH SERDEPROPERTIES ('hbase.columns.mapping' = ':key,Personal:Name,Personal:Phone,Office:Phone,Office:Address') TBLPROPERTIES ('hbase.table.name' = 'Contacts');
